sentences.en: A philosopher dwells in the realm of ideas.
sentences.cn: 哲学家停留在概念的王国里.

sentences.en: Defence of the realm is crucial.
Entering the realm of Nirvana is only possible for those who have become pure.
Geochemical prospecting remains in the realm of the naturalist.
sentences.cn: 地球化学普查仍停留在自然王国.

sentences.en: He made outstanding contributions in the realm of foreign affairs.
sentences.cn: 他在外交领域作出了卓越贡献.

sentences.en: In the realm of sculpture too, the technical skill of foreign artists was long recognised.
sentences.cn: 在雕塑领域，外国艺术家的技艺也早已得到认可。

sentences.en: Students' interests are mostly limited to the academic realm.
sentences.cn: 学生们的兴趣大多限于学术领域。

sentences.en: The hypothesis no longer belongs to the realm of science fiction.
sentences.cn: 这种设想已不是科学幻想.

sentences.en: The king maintained order within the bounds of his realm.
sentences.cn: 国王在其王国的疆界之内维持着秩序.

sentences.en: The king was concerned about the safety of the realm.
sentences.cn: 国王十分关心王国的安全.

sentences.en: Their failures in the realm have damaged their self - confidence and creditability.
sentences.cn: 他们在本领域的失败使他们的自信心和可信度受损.

sentences.en: Truth telling is not compatible with the defense of the realm.
sentences.cn: 宣告真理与保卫这个王国是不相符合的两件事.

sentences.en: We now formulate a general definition within the realm of functions.
sentences.cn: 现在我们用函数的语言来叙述一般的定义.

sentences.en: Yet analogous remarks holds for the realm of physics.
sentences.cn: 然而,类似的说法在自然科学领域中也是成立的.

trans.tran_cn: 领域，范围，王国，（学术的）部门，界，（动植物分布的）圈，带
trans.tran_en: a general area of knowledge, activity, or thought
